snippet.title: But I Don't Wanna Go Back - Dynamite Duchess 2, Appetite for Detention Episode 1
snippet.description:
Hey Guys, Lil Johnny Red here with Episode 1 of my Playthrough with Dynamite Duchess 2, Appetite for Detention a Total Conversion for GZDoom , Enjoy :D

Dinah Wick is back and ready to raise more mayhem but unfortunately for Dinah her uncle is sending her back to school. Her school might be going through some changes too with talks about a new curriculum and how some of her fellow classmates aboard the airship are acting very weird all the sudden.

The teachers are likely to be no better, but Dinah is prepared for this new and "Improved" schooling experience with A Cricket Bat in one hand and a cherry bomb in the other School is gonna be fun regardless.

Also this is just some Exposition, Real Action happens next episode.

"note this is a fictitious game set in a fantasy world, I know you guys are smart and all but don't actually go and be a menace at school... you don't need the disclaimer but YT might Rip my head off and "BLEEEP" down my neck if i don't say something"

- Fair warning, there will be more backtracking, puzzles and the need to talk to various NPCS.

Subscribe for more content: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdxO6M0m43DlMJVAssEP2dA

Share your thoughts in the comment section below as I would love to hear them, Don't forget to like the vid if you like it, subscribe if you want more content and if you wish to then share this video.

The Playlist For Convenient watching purposes : https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkGiL6RXWOTDgrQ1BMNh4NH7x6n88Nk6X

Where to get the mods 
Dynamite Duchess 2 : https://www.mediafire.com/file/38aaw41mz9f2cn4/detention.zip/file

Where to get the games : 
Heretic : https://www.gog.com/en/game/heretic_shadow_of_the_serpent_riders

(Credits area)
ID Software - Creating the game engine
Mike Macdee - For creating the total conversion

#Doom #Modding #Gameplay
